Launch of the "Ghars" Training Program in Collaboration with Ajeel Educational Center
12  May,  2024
Best Buddies Qatar began implementing the "Ghars" training program in collaboration with the Ajeel Educational Center, involving members of the Citizen program. The program consisted of eight diverse and purposeful training workshops that serve Best Buddies' mission and vision of promoting social integration, unleashing their potential, and highlighting their capabilities in society while focusing on developing their skills and honing their talents. The program also emphasized the importance of instilling religious, national, and educational values in them during the workshops.
